documentation.author: Tamra Lawson/Nicole Chaska
documentation.purpose: This rule will alert a user of a patient's STAT order
documentation.explanation: This rule will execute a ccl that will send an alert to notify a user when a patient has a STAT order added to their chart.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_LIST_E
templateDefinitions.definition: an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS and an optional order detail of OPT_ORDER_DETAIL that OPT_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_LOC_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL that QUAL in DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_LIST_INCOMING_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS and an optional order detail of OPT_ORDER_DETAIL that OPT_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST for any order(s) in LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_BUILD_MESSAGE_L
templateDefinitions.definition: ACTION a message named MSGNAME with text of MSGTEXT preceded by OPT_DELIMITER
templateDefinitions.description: Create or add to a text message to be used by subsequent templates

statements.statement:
select action = if (d.seq = 1) "Create" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Append To" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) "1" elseif (d.seq = 2) "2" ENDIF
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(2))

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_BUILD_MESSAGE_A
templateDefinitions.definition: ACTION a message named MSGNAME with text of MSGTEXT preceded by OPT_DELIMITER
templateDefinitions.description: Create or add to a text message to be used by subsequent templates

statements.statement:
select action = if (d.seq = 1) "Create" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Append To" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) "1" elseif (d.seq = 2) "2" ENDIF
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(2))

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_EXEC_CCL_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Execute a program PROGRAM_NAME with parameters OPT_PARAM and link to OPT_LINK.

value.value: A STAT @SYNONYM:5 has just been placed on @PATIENT:1.
A STAT @SYNONYM:5 has just been placed on @PATIENT:1.
